name: SmartFly
0:
”Alexa ask Smart Fly to read out table number 8”
”give me the formula for area of a circle”
”what is the formula for area of the square”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart fly
Developer Terms of Use
des: Smart Fly the Alexa skill is used to get your basic queries in Mathematics answered to start with. As of now the skill can help you with multiplication tables and small mathematical formulas. The skill will be improved to answer your other queries in Science, History, Technology, etc very soon. We will keep improving skill very frequently.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
